summary: The story of the international gymnastics phenomenon who overcame overwhelming odds to become the first African American ever to be named Individual All-Around Champion in artistic gymnastics at the Olympic Games.
cast: Regina King|Imani Hakim|Sydney Mikayla|Brian Tee|David Haydn-Jones|S. Epatha Merkerson|Gabby Douglas|Jai Jai Jones|CindyMarie Small|Sarah Surh|Meghan Boulanger|Kristen Harris|Dean Armstrong|Ciara Alexys|Riele Downs|Asha Bromfield|Arielle Hawkins|Marley Smith|Lola Assad|Kyal Legend|Thamela Mpumlwana|Stephan James|Lois Brothers|Abigail Pniowsky|Laura Cartlidge|Isabella Interian|Jim Kirby|Linnea Moffat|Lorrie Papadopoulos|Anna Pniowsky|Karen Tusa
title: The Gabby Douglas Story
